summary: The module provides a Checkov Terraform resource check that validates Azure Storage accounts are configured with Azure Defender (Microsoft Defender for Storage) enabled. It extends the generic resource check framework, specifies the applicable Azure storage resource types, examines the relevant configuration fields, and determines compliance status.
business_intent: To enforce security best practices by automatically detecting Azure Storage resources that lack Defender protection, thereby supporting compliance auditing and reducing the risk of data breaches in cloud environments.
